name: property_extended_search
description: Search for properties by parameters. *Note.* If you search by exact address, the endpoint will return only zpid, or list of `zpid`s if it's a building with many units or `lotId`s for building. **To get more information about a property by `zpid`, use a `/property` endpoint. For `lotId` use a `/building` endpoint.** `location` is required if `polygon` and `coordinates` are empty.

location.description: Location details (address, county, neighborhood or Zip code). It is required if the polygon or coordinates is empty. The maximum number of locations (city, zip code) is 5, separate location by ; Multi location /propertyExtendedSearch?location=78013;78014;New York, NY The maximum number of locations is 5 Max length: 100 Please note that for the ZIP Code Type PO Box there will be empty results.
location.title: Location

page.description: Page number if at the previous response totalPages > 1. Max value is 20. To be able to access more data, you can break down your request by dividing it into price groups using the minPrice and maxPrice parameters. For example 0 - 100,000, 100,001 - 500,000, 500,001 - 800,000 and so on. This trick will help you to get more data. Default: 0
page.title: Page

home_type.description: Property type comma-separated or empty for all types: For Rent Townhomes Houses Apartments_Condos_Co-ops For others: Multi-family Apartments Houses Manufactured Condos LotsLand Townhomes
home_type.title: Home Type

sort.description: For status_type = ForSale OR RecentlySold are available: Homes_for_You Price_High_Low Price_Low_High Newest Bedrooms Bathrooms Square_Feet Lot_Size default Homes_for_You For status_type = ForRent are available: Verified_Source Payment_High_Low Payment_Low_High Newest Bedrooms Bathrooms Square_Feet Lot_Size default Verified_Source
sort.title: Sort

polygon.description: Format: lon lat,lon1 lat1,lon2 lat2 It is required if the location or coordinates is empty. The last pair must be the same as the first pair.
polygon.title: Polygon

minPrice.description: If status_type = ForSale OR RecentlySold you can filter by min price. Default: 0
minPrice.title: Minprice

maxPrice.description: If status_type = ForSale OR RecentlySold you can filter by max price. Default: 0
maxPrice.title: Maxprice

rentMinPrice.description: If status_type = ForRent you can filter by min rent price. Default: 0
rentMinPrice.title: Rentminprice

rentMaxPrice.description: If status_type = ForRent you can filter by max rent price. Default: 0
rentMaxPrice.title: Rentmaxprice

daysOn.description: Days on Z. Use with status_type='ForSale' or status_type='ForRent' Available values: 1,7,14,30,90,6m,12m,24m,36m
daysOn.title: Dayson

soldInLast.description: 'Sold In Last' on Z. Use with status_type='RecentlySold'. Available values: 1,7,14,30,90,6m,12m,24m,36m

isComingSoon.description: Coming Soon listings are homes that will soon be on the market.. Set it to 1 if needed.

otherListings.description: If set to 1, the results will only include data from the Other Listings tab.
otherListings.title: Otherlistings

isNewConstruction.description: New Construction filter. Set it to 1 or true if you only need properties with New Construction status.

lotSizeMin.description: Available values: 1,000 sqft 2,000 sqft 3,000 sqft 4,000 sqft 5,000 sqft 7,500 sqft 1/4 acre/10,890 sqft 1/2 acre/21,780 sqft 1 acre/43,560 sqft

name: resolve_address_to_zpid
description: Resolving the addresses from the given file to `zpid`. The limit for the BASIC plan is 10 lines and for the other plans it is 100 lines. ***Cost: 1 request per line!*** Expand ==> Code snippet (Python) [gist.github.com](https://gist.github.com/apimaker001/6ec89060307f8b5d15c0b245e378fbd4) ***How does this work?*** You send a file with the addresses (one per line) and as the answer will receive data, where you will find `jobNumber` field. After some time (2 sec per line) use your `jobNumber` value and `/getJobResults` endpoint to get the results. ***Results example*** **You send the file with lines** 5500 Grand Lake Drive, San Antonio, TX 1636 Sonnet Drive, Grapevine, Texas 76051 2310 fairhill dr newport beach ca 92660 **You will receive the file with lines (format csv: address,zpid)** "5500 Grand Lake Drive, San Antonio, TX",26187246 "1636 Sonnet Drive, Grapevine, Texas 76051",28959146 "2310 fairhill dr newport beach ca 92660",2069242807,25214848

name: mortgage_rates
description: Get Mortgage Rates by state

program.description: The loan program. You can select from 1 to 4 programs, separated by commas. Available: Fixed30Year, Fixed20Year, Fixed15Year, Fixed10Year, ARM3, ARM5, ARM7, HomeEquity30Year, HomeEquity30YearDueIn15, HomeEquity15Year, HELOC20Year, HELOC15Year, HELOC10Year
program.title: Program

state.description: The state abbreviation. AK,AL,AR,AS,AZ,CA,CO,CT,DC,DE,FL,GA, GU,HI,IA,ID,IL,IN,KS,KY,LA,MA,MD,ME,MH, MI,MN,MO,MP,MS,MT,NC,ND,NE, NH,NJ,NM,NV,NY,OH,OK,OR,PA,PR,RI,SC,SD,TN,TX,UT,VA,VI,VT,WA,WI,WV,WY,US
state.title: State

loanType.description: Valid values: Conventional, FHA, VA, USDA, other, Jumbo
loanType.title: Loantype

name: property_estimate_mortgage
description: Get estimated monthly mortgage payment

zpid.description: Unique ID that Zillow gives to each property.
zpid.title: Zpid

name: monthly_inventory
description: Monthly Inventory. - Active Listing Count, Active Listing Count M/M - Avg Listing Price, Avg Listing Price M/M - Days on Market, Days on Market M/M - New Listing Count, New Listing Count M/M - Median Listing Price, Median Listing Price M/M - Total Listing Count, Total Listing Count M/M - Price Increase Count, Price Increase Count m/M

zip.description: Required if yyyymm is empty. ex. 17249 Default: 0

yyyymm.description: Required if zip is empty. From 201607 to the previous month. Default: 202411
